a propos for definit in algol an extens to algol
is propos for ad new data type and oper to
the languag definit mai occur in ani block head and
termin with the block thei ar an integr part of
the program and ar not fix in the languag even
the behavior of exist oper mai be redefin the process
of text contain defin context featur a replac rule that
elimin unnecessari iter and temporari storag exampl of definit set
ar given for real and complex matric complex number file
